Carmelo Anthony and LeBron James were the headliners, but Allen Iverson and JR Josh Smith stole the show. Allen Iverson scored a season-high 37 points and Josh Smith added 29 to help the Denver Nuggets beat the Cleveland Cavaliers 122-100 on Monday night. They didn't steal my spotlight, said Carmelo Anthony , who had 22 points and nine rebounds. "They did what they were supposed to do. They took advantage of the defense that they threw at us." After acknowledging that he's been a keen observer of the late-night battle for many years, Howard Stern suggested that he supports David Letterman because he has a personal distaste for Jay Leno . You know as well as everyone in this room, Jay Leno is horrible, he asserted. " Jay Leno 's got no talent."
